price: Од ҳам ёлғончига чиқарди. Бас, азобим ва огоҳлантиришим қандай бўлди?!
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
